body:
@trws @homerdin 

This PR resolves https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/13117 in part. Once the PR is full integrated, I will need @homerdin to excise all the `flang` references in the main `llvm` package.

Here is a list of what is in this PR:
- new `llvm-flang` package for the flang fork of LLVM
- Updates to the `flang` package so it depends on `llvm-flang`
- Updates to the `flang` and `pgmath` package to include new and missing releases
- Minor bug fixes to  `flang` package
- Additional patch for the `pgmath` package
title: LLVM-Flang package
